data.name: Brothers
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

“The kind of behavior exhibited by the drill sergeant would result in adverse legal actions taken against him… Because this script deviates fairly widely from reality we will not be able to support the filming on an Army installation.” - Lt. Colonel. That’s what the US army thought of my script. I remember the smile on my face. I was an athlete used to hours of extreme exercise, and I thought the military was going to be easy. But after the first day I didn’t smile anymore. I was used to exercises that build you up; In the military all they did was break you down. You work out for days, you get bullied, and you don’t get to stop when you’re tired and pissed off. You just keep going. Stories of revenge were gladly shared, we held on to anything that made us feel free again. But there was one story that I will never forget. A rebellion so insane that it simply couldn’t be true; this is what I decided to base my short film on. I’m Swedish so my military experience was different, but If the US military doesn’t want to support it I must have done something right. This is my revenge story. Adam Stumle Writer & Director
data.about_the_game:
“The kind of behavior exhibited by the drill sergeant would result in adverse legal actions taken against him… Because this script deviates fairly widely from reality we will not be able to support the filming on an Army installation.” - Lt. Colonel.

That’s what the US army thought of my script.

I remember the smile on my face. I was an athlete used to hours of extreme exercise, and I thought the military was going to be easy. But after the first day I didn’t smile anymore. I was used to exercises that build you up; In the military all they did was break you down. You work out for days, you get bullied, and you don’t get to stop when you’re tired and pissed off. You just keep going.

Stories of revenge were gladly shared, we held on to anything that made us feel free again. But there was one story that I will never forget. A rebellion so insane that it simply couldn’t be true; this is what I decided to base my short film on. I’m Swedish so my military experience was different, but If the US military doesn’t want to support it I must have done something right.

This is my revenge story.

Adam Stumle
Writer & Director
data.short_description: Fresh off the bus, a struggling squad of recruits band together to battle the bone-crushing demands of their maniacal Drill Sergeant.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
